commands.about:
Tickets je enostaven za uporabo in zelo nastavljiv bot za vstopnice in podporo.
Podporni strežnik: https://discord.gg/ticketsbot
Ukazi: Vnesite `/help`
Začnite tako, da zaženete `/setup`
commands.add.no_members: Za dodajanje vstopnice morate omeniti člane
commands.add.no_permission: Nimate dovoljenja za dostop do tega zahtevka
commands.addadmin.no_members: Omeniti morate uporabnika ali poimenovati vlogo, ki ji želite podeliti skrbniške pravice
commands.addsupport.no_members: Omeniti morate uporabnika ali poimenovati vlogo, ki ji želite podeliti privilegije predstavnika podpore
commands.blacklist.no_members: Omeniti morate uporabnika, za katerega želite spremeniti status črnega seznama
commands.blacklist.self: Ne morete se uvrstiti na črno
commands.language.invalid: Določiti morate jezikovno kodo ali zastavico. Razpoložljivi jeziki:\n%s
commands.open.too_many_tickets: V kategoriji vstopnic je preveč vstopnic. Prosite skrbnika, da nekatere zapre, jih premakne v drugo kategorijo ali nastavi kategorijo presežka. To je **Discordova omejitev** 50 kanalov na kategorijo.
commands.premium:
Premijsko naročnino lahko kupite pri <https://www.patreon.com/ticketsbot-cloud>.
Premium ponuja številne prednosti, kot so:
```diff
+ Ustvarite neomejene plošče vstopnic
+ Prilagodite ime bota, avatar in stanje (bela oznaka)
+ Podrobna statistika o strežniku, uporabnikih in podpornem osebju
+ Brez blagovnih znamk v nogi sporočil
+ Podprite razvoj in mi pomagajte plačati stroške strežnika
```

Lahko pa glasujete tudi na <https://vote.tickets.bot> za 24-urno brezplačno premijo
commands.premium.invalid_key: Neveljaven ključ. Prepričajte se, da ste ga pravilno kopirali.
commands.remove.no_permission: Nimate dovoljenja za odstranjevanje oseb s te vstopnice
commands.remove.staff: Osebja ne morete odstraniti z vstopnice
commands.removeadmin.no_members: Omeniti morate uporabnika ali poimenovati vlogo, ki ji želite preklicati skrbniške pravice
commands.removesupport.no_members: Omeniti morate uporabnika ali poimenovati vlogo, ki ji želite podeliti privilegije predstavnika podpore
commands.rename.missing_name: Za to vstopnico morate določiti novo ime
commands.rename.success: Ta vstopnica je bila preimenovana v <#%d>
commands.tags.create.already_exists: Oznaka z ID-jem »%s« že obstaja. Oznako lahko izbrišete z `/tag delete %s`
commands.tags.create.invalid_arguments: Določiti morate ID in vsebino oznake
commands.tags.create.too_long: ID-ji oznak ne smejo biti daljši od 16 znakov

commands.unclaim.success: Vsi predstavniki podpore lahko zdaj odgovorijo na vstopnico
commands.vote: Kliknite tukaj, če želite glasovati za 24 ur brezplačne premim:\n<https://vote.ticketsbot.cloud>

premium.subscription_found_content: In order to apply your subscription to this server, the server owner (<@%d>) must add you as an admin **user** (roles are ignored) via the </addadmin:%d> command.\n\nYou can verify that you have been added as an admin user by running </viewstaff:%d>.
premium.success_after_check: Premium is now active in this server!
premium.no_subscription: Could not find an active Patreon subscription linked to your Discord account. Ensure that you [have linked your Patreon and Discord accounts](https://support.patreon.com/hc/en-us/articles/212052266-Get-my-Discord-role), and a further waited 10 minutes.
premium.open_form_description: Press the button below to reopen the form
premium.already_purchased_description: If you have already purchased premium, select the payment method from the dropdown to get started

selector.description: Select which method you used to obtain premium

key.description: Select this option if you were given a giveaway key

patreon.description: Select this option if you made your purchase on Patreon

discord.description: Select this option if you made your purchase within the Discord in-app store

premium.about: Premium gives you access to more panels, statistics, a custom bot and more! Visit our [website](https://tickets.bot/premium) to find out more.
premium.already_activated: Good news! Premium is already active in this server.
premium.already_activated_whitelabel:
Good news! Premium is already active in this server.

For help getting started with whitelabel, read [our whitelabel setup guide](https://docs.tickets.bot/premium/whitelabel-setup-guide).

discord.no_subscription:
Premium can be purchased within Discord directly. Click the button below this message to open the subscription management page.

One purchased, please allow up to 5 minutes for the subscription to be detected.

premium.subscription_found_content_modern: Your Patreon subscription has been found. Please click on the "Open Server Selector" button below in order to open the dashboard to select which servers you wish to apply your premium subscription to.

notes.added_to_existing: You have been added to the existing notes thread: <#%d>
notes.created: A notes thread has been created for this ticket: <#%d>
notes.channel_mode_only: Note threads are only supported in channel mode

rename.ratelimited: Due to limitations imposed by Discord, tickets can only be renamed twice every 10 minutes

vote.no_credits: Redemption failed: you do not have any vote credits!

success.plural: Your vote credits have been redeemed for **%d** days of premium!
success.singular: Your vote credits have been redeemed for **%d** day of premium!

with_credits.plural: You have **%d** vote credits. Click the "Redeem Credits" button below to redeem them for %d days of premium in this server.
with_credits.singular: You have **%d** vote credit. Click the "Redeem Credits" button below to redeem them for %d day of premium in this server.

close_request.no_permission: Only the user who opened the ticket can respond to the close request

decreption.read_messages: Allows the bot to view the content of a channel.
decreption.send_messages: Allows the bot to send messages in channels.
decreption.embed_links: Allows the bot to send ticket panels, welcome messages, and tags that include an embedded message.
decreption.attach_files: Allows the bot to assign the attach files permission to the ticket opener.
decreption.add_reactions: Allows the bot to add the buttons to ticket panels, welcome messages, and all commands that use buttons.
decreption.use_external_emojis: Allows the bot to use non-server emojis in ticket panels, welcome messages, and tags. Bot must still be in the other server to use them.
decreption.mention_everyone: Allows the bot to mention everyone, here and all roles in a ticket.
decreption.read_message_history: Allows the bot to read all messages in a channel.
decreption.manage_channels: Allows the bot to create, rename, recategorize, and delete channels.
decreption.manage_roles: Allows the bot to create and edit roles; give and take away roles from users; and adjust a channel's role permissions.
decreption.manage_webhooks: Allows the bot to create webhooks for transcripts, and for staff to use the dashboard to send messages or tags in open tickets.
decreption.manage_threads: Allows the bot to create, rename, close, and delete threads.
decreption.send_messages_in_threads: Allows the bot to send messages in threads.
decreption.create_public_threads: Allows the bot to create public threads.
decreption.create_private_threads: Allows the bot to create private threads, such as thread mode tickets and the /notes command for channel tickets.
decreption.use_application_commands: Allows the bot's slash commands to work.

help.switch_panel: Switches a ticket to another ticket panel, changing the channel category, support teams, etc.
help.jump_to_top: Provides you with a button to jump to the top of the ticket
help.on_call: Marks you as on call, to be added and pinged in all new tickets
help.reopen: Reopens a ticket that was previously closed
help.notes: Creates a thread for private discussion between support representatives

auto.docs: Want to explore more? Our [documentation](https://docs.tickets.bot) will teach you how to configure every aspect of the bot!

threads.no_notification_channel: You must provide a ticket notification channel
threads.notification_channel_type: The ticket notification channel must be a text channel

join_thread.closed_ticket: This ticket has already been closed
join_thread.no_permission: Nimate dovoljenja za ogled te vrste vstopnice
join_thread.already_joined: Tej vstopnici ste se že pridružili (<#%d>)

open.thread_in_announcement_channel: V kanalih za objave ni mogoče ustvariti niti
open.panel_force_disabled: Ta plošča je bila onemogočena. Prosimo, prosite skrbnika strežnika, da ponovno aktivira premium in zažene %s, da ponovno omogoči to ploščo.
open.panel_disabled: Skrbniki strežnika so onemogočili odpiranje te vrste vstopnice

acl.no_allow_rules: Access to open this type of ticket has been disabled for all roles
acl.deny_listed: You are unable to open this type of ticket because you have the role <@&%d>

not_allow_listed.multiple: You need one of the following roles to open this type of ticket: %s
not_allow_listed.single: You need the following role to open this type of ticket: %s
